titles.title: Department of Defense Ethics and Anti-Corruption Act of 2023
Department of Defense Ethics and Anti-Corruption Act of 2023
To promote ethics and prevent corruption in Department of Defense contracting and other activities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
